metadata.title: ProCare Quick-Fit II Wrist Support Brace, Left Hand, X-Large
features: A universal, functional wrist arthrosis for the treatment of wrist and hand injuries and trauma
Designed with a single pull lace and a soft nylon/foam laminate which offers premium comfort
An adjustable, malleable dorsal stay pod can be placed in the proper location for maximum immobilization or removed completely
Features a unique contoured palmar stay that provides proper anatomical fit, allowing full finger dexterity
Universal design allows the ProCare Quick-Fit II Wrist Support Brace to be used by both men and women
description: The ProCare Quick-Fit II Wrist Support Brace is a universal, functional wrist arthrosis for the treatment of wrist and hand injuries and trauma. Designed with a single pull lace and a soft nylon/foam laminate which offers premium comfort. An adjustable, malleable dorsal stay pod can be placed in the proper location for maximum immobilization or removed completely during rehabilitation. The ProCare Quick-Fit II Wrist Support Brace has a unique contoured palmar stay that provides proper anatomical fit, allowing full finger dexterity and may be contoured as needed to address a variety of indications. Universal design allows the ProCare Quick-Fit II Wrist Support Brace to be used by both men and women.
